snippet.title: Sonic (Project) Advanced - 2021 Update - Tails Showcase
snippet.description:
The second part of the 2021 update. Sonic's sidekick, Tails, has finally joined the roster.

_____

Join the Discord group if you'd like to be kept up-to-date with this project!
Sonic (Project) Advanced Discord: https://discord.gg/73Gt2Fuu3z

_____

Songs Used:

Greenflower Zone 1 - Dave "DemonTomatoDave" Bulmer, Shane "CobaltBW" Ellis, Alexander "DrTapeworm" Moench-Ford, Shane Mychal Sexton (Sonic Robo Blast 2)
Tornado Defense - 1st Battle (Sonic Unleashed)
Fly Away (Sonic Runners)
Believe in Myself - Instrumental (Sonic Adventure 2)

_____

I'm open to feedback/suggestions in the comments, so feel free to post away! I'll also try to answer as many questions as I can- though I highly suggest joining the Discord I've linked above if you want to discuss more about this project.
